data.message: I am glad you can see a person's edit history--imagine liking or commenting on a post that then gets edited and the content entirely changed. It would then look as if you liked something completely uncharacteristic and there isn't a time stamp on your like so you could be left hanging out to dry. At least if you are keeping track of the post and you see a edit that causes you to disagree with a previous liking you could undo it

replies.message: Thanks for sharing your feedback, Shilo! -Sarah
That is the point of facebook  they want everyone to know everything!  Do you not think they knew as smart as they are what they were doing?
